title: New MyCanyon Program Adds Unique Artwork, Component Customization to Just One Bike (For Now)
content:
Canyon's new program allows for a special selection of paint, component customization, and best of all, custom stem length.

Read the full article at New MyCanyon Program Adds Unique Artwork, Component Customization to Just One Bike (For Now) on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
